articles.title: DOGE’s fate after the Bitcoin halving: Should you bet on an ATH? - AMBCrypto News
articles.description: A crypto trader predicted DOGE's rapid ascent to its ATH by July/August.
articles.content:
• DOGE rose 3% to $0.157 in the hours following the Bitcoin halving.
  • Whales were taking long positions for DOGE in the futures market.
